mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPT_TITLE, A.STU_ID, C.STU_NAME, C.STU_STATUS, A.ATTENDANCE, A.ASSIGNMENT, A.MIDEXAM, A.FINEXAM, (A.ATTENDANCE + A.ASSIGNMENT + A.MIDEXAM + A.FINEXAM) AS GRADE_TOTAL, A.GRADE_RESULT, A.GRADE_CREDIT, E.SUB_CODE, A.GRADE_YEAR, A.GRADE_SEMESTER, A.GRADE_NO FROM GRADE A LEFT JOIN LECT_REGISTER B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN STUDENT C ON A.STU_ID=C.STU_ID AND B.STU_ID=C.STU_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN SUBJECT E ON A.SUB_CODE=E.SUB_CODE AND B.SUB_CODE=E.SUB_CODE WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND GRADE_YEAR=#{gradeYear} AND GRADE_SEMESTER=${gradeSemester} AND B.YEAR=#{gradeYear} AND B.SEMESTER=${gradeSemester} ORDER BY STU_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRADE(GRADE_NO, STU_ID, SUB_CODE, GRADE_YEAR, GRADE_SEMESTER) VALUES(SEQ_GRADE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{studentId}, #{subCode}, #{gradeYear}, #{gradeSemester})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GRA_OBJECT A JOIN STUDENT B ON A.STU_ID=B.STU_ID JOIN GRADE C ON A.GRADE_NO=C.GRADE_NO JOIN SUBJECT D ON D.SUB_CODE=C.SUB_CODE WHERE D.PROF_ID=#{profId}

SELECT A.GRA_OBJ_NO, B.STU_NAME, A.TITLE, A.GRA_OBJ_DATE, A.STATUS FROM GRA_OBJECT A JOIN STUDENT B ON A.STU_ID=B.STU_ID JOIN GRADE C ON A.GRADE_NO=C.GRADE_NO JOIN SUBJECT D ON D.SUB_CODE=C.SUB_CODE WHERE D.PROF_ID=#{profId} ORDER BY GRA_OBJ_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM GRA_OBJECT JOIN STUDENT USING(STU_ID) WHERE GRA_OBJ_NO=#{objNo}
